short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds game controlor support to the tiktok web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to use a game controller while in tiktoks full screen mode

Controls 
Next Video: R1 or R2
Previous Video: L1 or L2
Pause: A
Like: Double tap A
